Exclusion.definition: the act of excluding or state of being excluded ;specif

1.definition: the act of excluding or state of being excludedrefusal of entry into the U.S. by immigration officials [review of deportation and orders] compare

2.definition: something that excludes or is excluded

sub_terms.a: a part of an insurance contract that excludes specified risks from coverage compare,
sub_terms.b: an amount that is excluded from tax liability [a $10,000 annual per donee for gifts "W. M. McGovern, Jr."] compare,,
